title: 'Wow'

title: 'Useful for people with Sweaty Hands'
body: The pen's body gives better grip while writing and the ink is waterproof which helps me while working with sweaty hands. Been a trimax lover for years now, it has saved me a lot of exams!

title: '0.5mm? I dont think so!'
body: I compared the writing of this trimax pen with the Pilot Hi-techpoint V5RT 0.5mm. The pilot writes way more finer than the trimax. Ink is too flowly, grip is kinda meh. If you're looking to buy this pen for the tip size then don't, there's better offerings out there (eg Trimax, Sharpie, Pentel).
